alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 6:31PM CDT until March 31 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR MONROE AND SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Festus, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Quarter size hail was reported near DeSoto. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Valmeyer, Fountain and New Design around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Waterloo and Columbia. This also includes Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 180. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Illinois...and east central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
